title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Critically acclaimed with an 8.6 IMDb rating and 26K+ votes, this Apple TV series is created by renowned showrunner Vince Gilligan.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Highly rated with an 8.0 IMDb score and over 45K votes, this HBO drama features Mark Ruffalo and comes from the acclaimed creator of 'Mare of Easttown'.
